 Magnus dodged the shot and transformed into his
monkey mode. He fired plasma shots from his wrists the
size of his hand. His guns came over his shoulders and
a red point landed on hell beasts chest and a
automatic fired numerous shots.
--- JP3884@... wrote:
>        Hell Beast fell backwards off of Rampage as
> Magnus' shots rained down 
> on him. Rampage was hit more than Hell Beast, but
> the giant crab pointed 
> upward with his tricanon and fired at Magnus.
> 
>        Tarantulas saw the shields shatter. And what
> a beautiful sight it was. 
> However, the Maximals were right. The Element stood
> only a few hundred feet 
> away and if the Predacons destroyed it, they
> Maximals would probly have the 
> good luck of some other brand new and all powerful
> ship crashing into this 
> area. 
>
